title: Elling
writer: Ingvar Ambjørnsen (novel), Axel Hellstenius, Larry Stuckey
actors: Per Christian Ellefsen, Sven Nordin, Marit Pia Jacobsen, Jørgen Langhelle
plot: When his mother, who has sheltered him his entire 40 years, dies, Elling, a sensitive, would-be poet, is sent to live in a state institution. There he meets Kjell Bjarne, a gentle giant and...
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 4 nominations.
